ObjectClass.Name: Macrofab
ObjectClass.Description:
MACROFAB:
Produces the following units: MAR, FRIGATE, MFB, BLACKBIRD, HEAVY CRUISER
Equips HEAVY CRUISER with nukes

Objective.Name: Build MFB
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires the Machinery\ upgrade at the ARMORY

Objective.Name: Build Frigate
Objective.Details: Very fast air mechanical vehicle\Air superiority fighter\Clears negative status effects\[ Weapon ] Ground: 35 Air: 103

Objective.Name: Build MFB
Objective.Details: Medium speed ground mechanical vehicle\Repairs and heals all units\Clears negative status effects\[ Weapon ] Ground: 45 Air: 42

Objective.Name: Build Blackbird
Objective.Details: Fast air mechanical armor\Repairs mechanical units\Cloaks\[ Weapon ] Ground: 56 Air: 56

Objective.Name: Build Heavy Cruiser
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires the Machinery and Aerospace\ upgrades at the FACTORY and MACROFAB

Objective.Name: Build MAR Tank
Objective.Details: Medium speed ground mechanical vehicle\Strong against ground targets\Can merge with another MAR\no anti-air weapon\[ Weapon ] Ground: 73 Air: 0

Objective.Name: Build Heavy Cruiser
Objective.Details: Fast air mechanical armor\Weapons platform\Carries and drops nukes\Splash damage weapon\[ Weapon ] Ground: 70 Air: 70

Objective.Name: Build Blackbird
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires the Machinery\ upgrade at the ARMORY

Objective.Name: Equip Nuke
Objective.Details: \Automatically equip closest\HEAVY CRUISER with a Mini Nuke

Objective.Name: Equip Nuke
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires the Aerospace\ upgrade at the ARMORY
